001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.ElapsedTime;
004
005public class Integral {
006    private double accumulator;
007    private ElapsedTime deltaTime;
008
009    public Integral(double c) {
010        accumulator = c;
011        deltaTime = new ElapsedTime();
012    }
013
014    public Integral() {
015        this(0);
016    }
017
018    public Integral set(double c) {
019        accumulator = c;
020        return this;
021    }
022
023    public Integral zero() {
024        return set(0);
025    }
026
027    public double update(double change) {
028        accumulator += change * deltaTime.seconds();
029        deltaTime.reset();
030        return accumulator;
031    }
032
033    public double getValue() {
034        return accumulator;
035    }
036}
